Privacy Policy

Last Updated: January 14, 2026

1. Introduction

Delivery Apps Now Inc. ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") operates AIAgentPals, a mobile application designed to run artificial intelligence models entirely on your local device. We are committed to protecting your privacy and have designed our Service with privacy as a fundamental principle.

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application. Please read this policy carefully.

2. Information We Do NOT Collect

Our Privacy Commitment

AIAgentPals is built on a foundation of privacy. We do NOT collect, store, transmit, or have access to:

  • Your conversations: All AI interactions occur entirely on your device and are never sent to our servers
  • Prompts or queries: Your questions and inputs to AI models remain private on your device
  • AI-generated responses: Model outputs are processed and stored only on your device
  • Custom "Pals" configurations: Your custom AI agents and their settings are stored locally
  • Personal documents or files: Any files you analyze with AI models stay on your device
  • Conversation history: Chat logs are stored only in your device's local storage

3. Information We DO Collect

To provide and improve our Service, we collect limited, non-sensitive information:

3.1 Account Information

When you create an account, we collect:

  • Email address
  • Account credentials (encrypted passwords)
  • User ID (generated automatically)
  • Account creation date
  • Subscription tier (Starter, Pro, or Power User)

3.2 Device and Technical Information

To ensure compatibility and improve performance, we collect:

  • Device model and operating system version
  • App version number
  • Device RAM and storage capacity (for model compatibility)
  • Crash reports and error logs (anonymized)
  • Performance metrics (app load times, inference speed)

3.3 Usage Analytics

We collect aggregated, anonymized usage data:

  • Which AI models are downloaded (not what you do with them)
  • Feature usage frequency (which features are most popular)
  • Session duration and frequency
  • Model download success/failure rates

3.4 Purchase Information

Payment processing is handled by Apple App Store or Google Play Store. We receive:

  • Transaction confirmation (not payment details)
  • Purchase date and tier
  • Receipt validation tokens

We do not collect or store credit card numbers, billing addresses, or other payment information.

4. How We Use Your Information

We use the limited information we collect to:

  • Provide and maintain the Service
  • Authenticate your account and verify purchases
  • Send important updates about the Service (security alerts, policy changes)
  • Improve app performance and fix bugs
  • Understand which features are most valuable to users
  • Ensure device compatibility with AI models
  • Respond to customer support inquiries
  • Comply with legal obligations

5. On-Device Processing

AIAgentPals uses Apple's MLX framework (on iOS) and Android's Neural Networks API (on Android) to run AI models entirely on your device. This means:

  • Your data never leaves your device during AI processing
  • The app works fully offline once models are downloaded
  • No internet connection is required for AI interactions
  • Models run using your device's CPU, GPU, and/or Neural Engine
  • All processing happens in your device's secure enclave

6. Data Storage and Security

6.1 Local Storage

All conversation history, custom Pals, and user preferences are stored exclusively on your device using:

  • iOS Keychain (for sensitive data)
  • iOS File System with encryption at rest
  • Android Keystore and Encrypted SharedPreferences

6.2 Cloud Storage

The only information we store on our servers is:

  • Account credentials (encrypted)
  • Purchase verification data
  • Anonymized analytics (aggregated across all users)

All server data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256).

6.3 Security Measures

We implement industry-standard security practices:

  • End-to-end encryption for authentication
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Secure coding practices and code reviews
  • Limited employee access to any user data
  • Compliance with Apple and Google security requirements

7. Third-Party Services

AIAgentPals integrates with the following third-party services:

7.1 App Stores

  • Apple App Store: Handles payment processing and app distribution
  • Google Play Store: Handles payment processing and app distribution

These platforms have their own privacy policies that govern payment transactions.

7.2 Analytics Services

We use privacy-focused analytics that:

  • Do not use cookies or persistent identifiers
  • Aggregate data before transmission
  • Do not track individual user behavior
  • Comply with GDPR and CCPA requirements

7.3 Model Providers

AI models are downloaded from trusted sources (Hugging Face, direct model providers). We only download models; no usage data is sent to model providers.

8. Your Privacy Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

8.1 Access and Portability

You can request a copy of the limited data we store about you (email, account info, purchase history).

8.2 Correction

You can update your email address and account information in the app settings.

8.3 Deletion

You can delete your account at any time through the app settings. This will:

  • Remove your account from our servers within 30 days
  • Delete all locally stored data on your device (if you uninstall the app)
  • Invalidate your purchase license (purchases are non-refundable)

8.4 Opt-Out of Analytics

You can disable anonymous usage analytics in the app settings at any time.

9. Children's Privacy

AIAgentPals is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will promptly delete it.

Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided information to us should contact us immediately.

10. International Data Transfers

Our servers are located in the United States. If you access AIAgentPals from outside the U.S., your limited account information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the U.S.

We comply with applicable data protection laws and use standard contractual clauses for international transfers where required.

11. California Privacy Rights (CCPA)

California residents have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act:

  • Right to know what personal information we collect
  • Right to delete personal information
  • Right to opt-out of sale of personal information (we do not sell your information)
  • Right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@aiagentpals.com.

12. European Privacy Rights (GDPR)

If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have rights under the General Data Protection Regulation:

  • Right of access to your personal data
  • Right to rectification of inaccurate data
  • Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
  • Right to restrict processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Right to object to processing
  • Right to withdraw consent

Our legal basis for processing is your consent and contractual necessity. To exercise your rights or lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, contact us at privacy@aiagentpals.com.

13. Data Retention

We retain your information only as long as necessary:

  • Account data: Until you delete your account, plus 30 days for processing
  • Purchase records: 7 years for tax and legal compliance
  • Analytics data: 90 days in identifiable form, then permanently anonymized
  • Crash reports: 90 days

Local device data persists until you uninstall the app or clear app data.

14. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of material changes by:

  • Updating the "Last Updated" date
  • Displaying an in-app notification
  • Sending an email to your registered address (for significant changes)

Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

15. Contact Us

If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

Delivery Apps Now Inc.

AIAgentPals Privacy Team

Email: privacy@aiagentpals.com

Support: legal@aiagentpals.com

Website: https://aiagentpals.com

We will respond to all requests within 30 days in accordance with applicable law.
